dcterms:creator: A. Ramisa
F. Yan
F. Moreno-Noguer
K. Mikolajczyk
dcterms:description: A dataset for news image captioning that includes images and their corresponding news articles, focusing on generating informative captions that follow journalistic guidelines.
dcterms:title: GoodNews

dcterms:creator: A. Tran
A. Mathews
L. Xie
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for news image captioning that includes a substantial number of articles, images, and captions, designed to facilitate the generation of entity-aware captions.
dcterms:title: NYTimes800k
